title: Test Lens - Tame flaky tests before they disrupt your productivity

hero.title: Tame flaky tests before they disrupt your productivity
hero.description: TestLens surfaces test failures from your CI pipeline directly in your pull request, allows you to mute unrelated failures, and trigger a rerun with a single click.

steps.title: Open a pull request
steps.description: TestLens starts monitoring your test runs as soon as you open a pull request.

steps.title: Inspect test failures
steps.description: As tests run, TestLens flags flaky and failing tests directly in your pull request comments.

steps.title: Decide how to proceed
steps.description: With a single click, you mute flaky tests and let TestLens rerun tests as needed.

steps.title: Merge the pull request with confidence
steps.description: With flaky tests muted and tests passing, the pull request is ready to merge.
